document.full_text: a suicide bomber on thursday attacked a large shiite mosque in diyala province, killing at least 12 people and injuring dozens, according to an iraqi security official.
document.title: 12 die as shiite mosque in iraq is bombed again
lines_and_colors: a suicide bomber on thursday attacked a large shiite mosque in diyala province, killing at least 12 people and injuring dozens, according to an iraqi security official.
